item.title: Mathematics of Active Gels: Bifurcations & Stability
item.description: In this talk we present analytical studies of active gels and cell motility. We start from a brief overview of out-of-equilibrium active matter systems (e.g., active gels, bacterial suspensions, etc.) and mathematical challenges in their modeling and analysis. Next we present three minimal models of active gels: a phase-field model and two free boundary models.
